Title: Relates to prohibiting bail when a defendant is charged with a felony sex crime with a minor victim who is a vulnerable person or a person with a disability
Summary: Prohibits bail when a defendant is charged with a felony sex crime with a minor victim who is a vulnerable person or a person with a disability.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the criminal procedure law, in relation to prohibiting bail when a defendant is charged with a felony sex crime with a minor victim who is a vulnerable person or a person with a disability
